summary: This is an email/calendar invitation from Allison Stoddart scheduling a Zoom meeting related to the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The meeting is set for November 22, 2021, and includes attendees from legal and law enforcement roles, indicating coordination for the ongoing trial proceedings.

persons.name: Allison Stoddart
persons.context: Appears as the organizer and sender of the email/calendar invitation scheduling a Zoom meeting for the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Anjan Sahni
persons.context: Listed as a recipient (To:) of the meeting invitation regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the defendant in the referenced case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: Both are involved in coordinating a meeting for the Ghislaine Maxwell case, indicating a professional working relationship.
Stoddart is organizing a meeting related to the legal case against Maxwell.

events.title: Scheduled Zoom Meeting for Maxwell Case
events.description: A Zoom meeting is scheduled from 6:00 PM to 7:00 PM Eastern Time to discuss the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: A Zoom meeting was scheduled for November 22, 2021, to discuss the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.
The meeting was organized by Allison Stoddart and included attendee Anjan Sahni.
The document is an internal email/calendar invitation, showing coordination among legal/law enforcement personnel during the trial period.
